00079         struct MapiCommandType {
00080             MapiCommandCodeType command_code;
00081             UINT32 parm1;
00082             UINT32 parm2;
00083             UINT32 parm3;
00084             UINT32 parm4;
00085             UINT32 parm5;
00086             UINT32 parm6;
00087             UINT32 parm7;
00088         };
00089 
00091         enum RequestAcceptanceType {
00092             RequestExecuted = 0, // request has been accepted and has been executed
00093             RequestRejected = 1, // the request has been rejected and has NOT been executed
00094             RequestUnexpectedCommand = 100, // the signal received belongs to a different command
00095             RequestTimeout = 101, // the request has been accepted and forwarded, but no result message has been received by the priority manager
00096             RequestAudMapiFailure = 102     // the return-code from AUD_mapi was not aud_rc_ok.
00097         };
00098 
00099 
00101         struct RequestOutcomeType {
00102             RequestAcceptanceType acceptance_outcome;
00103             INT32 mapi_return_value;                // the result of the mapi command
00104         };
00105
